description:
The usual crew goes on a school trip adventure!
Share Joy-Conâ„¢ and play with up to 4 players!

Enjoy "Pillow Fight," "Rickshaw Race,"
"Souvenir Battle,"and more for a total of
10 different missions!

Try gathering the Collection Coins for yourself
or challenge all missions in order to become a
true "Field Trip Master!"

[Pillow Fight]
Throw your pillow and fight to win!

[Karaoke Battle]
Become the karaoke number one!

[Rickshaw Race]
Carry your passengers to the goal!

[Sightseeing Snapshots]
Go sightseeing and take the best snapshots!

[Hide from the Teacher]
Play and avoid getting caught!

[Pottery Experience]
Make pottery to match the picture!

[Speed Showdown]
Make quick decisions and win!

[Gather the Deer!]
Gather deer in your enclosure!

[Souvenir Battle]
Help at the store and deliver souvenirs!

[Grand Spy Operation]
Sneak your way to the top floor!
name: Our Field Trip Adventure
